title: 33. Give More, Fear Less: Shelley Hancock's Heart Based Approach to Owning a Spa + Thriving in the Treatment Room
description:
Hi Treatment Roomies! Today we are chatting with industry icon, Shelley Hancock, an esthetician of now 33 years. She is a mentor, consultant, public speaker, author, and former esthetic training center director.. In this episode we dive into treatment roomand spa business tips!

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Shop Shelley's retail, equipment, books and find more resources for estheticians!

https://www.shelleyhancock.com

IG: @shelley.hancock

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
